response.original_title: NASA 50 Years of Space Exploration: Volume 2
response.overview: Volume 2 traces the epic Apollo missions that transformed the space program, especially the courageous story of Apollo 13. Plus, it’s détente in space with the docking of Apollo and Soyuz!  Includes: Apollo 13:"Houston We've Got a Problem",  Apollo 15: In the Mountains of the Moon,  Apollo 16: Nothing So Hidden,  Apollo 17: On the Shoulders of Giants,  The Mission of Apollo-Soyuz
response.tagline: The story of America’s courageous space explorers
response.title: NASA 50 Years of Space Exploration: Volume 2
